<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Randomize the run time of the Physical Table Stat Gatherer sys_trigger so there is no contention when multiple DBI's(in one DB server) run the same job.</description>
        <name>Randomize Stats Gatherer job run time</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[
    //Randomizing the the run_time of the sys_trigger between 1-60 mins
    var sysTriggerGr = new GlideRecord('sys_trigger');
    if (sysTriggerGr.get('ef99697453e1111076bcddeeff7b12d7')) {
	  var randomMin = Math.floor(Math.random() * 60) + 1;
	  var currentRunTime = sysTriggerGr.getValue('run_time');
	  if (!!currentRunTime) {
	    var newRunTime = new GlideDateTime(currentRunTime);
		newRunTime.addSeconds(randomMin * 60);
		sysTriggerGr.setValue('run_time', newRunTime);
		sysTriggerGr.update();
		gs.log('Updating the run_time of Physical Table Stat Gatherer sys_trigger from: ' + currentRunTime + ' to: ' + newRunTime);
	  }
    }
]]></script>
